title: Suraj's Guitar Classes
description: A bootcamp where I take you from 1-100 🎸
details: You must have a basic guitar and 20 minutes to learn daily.

title: Ananya's Piano Lessons
description: Step into the world of melodies with beginner piano 🎹
details: Requires a basic keyboard or piano. Practice 20 minutes daily.

title: Rahul's Drumming Basics
description: Learn rhythm and beats with fun drum sessions 🥁
details: Drum pads or a simple drum set recommended. 15 minutes daily.

title: Simran's Violin Workshop
description: Discover the art of violin playing from scratch 🎻
details: Requires a beginner violin and daily 20 minutes practice.

title: Arjun's Flute Journey
description: Learn to play soulful Indian & Western flute tunes 🎶
details: A beginner flute is required. Daily 10–15 minutes practice.

title: Meera's Vocal Mastery
description: Train your voice and learn classical & pop singing 🎤
details: No instrument required. Just passion for singing.

title: Kabir's Ukulele Fun
description: A cheerful course to master ukulele strumming 🌺
details: Basic ukulele required. Learn fun songs in 3 weeks.

title: Priya's Harmonium Course
description: Learn Indian classical music on harmonium 🎼
details: Requires a basic harmonium. Perfect for bhajans & ragas.

title: Dev's Music Production Bootcamp
description: Learn how to compose & produce music digitally 🎧
details: Laptop with DAW (FL Studio, Ableton, etc.) required.

title: Riya's Tabla Beats
details: Beginner tabla required. Daily 15 minutes practice.
